description: Try our easy to follow Lamb & Pea Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb & Pea Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the top of the pie all over with the remaining egg wash. Using a sharp knife, make 2 slits in the top to allow steam to escape. Bake in the oven for 30-40 minutes until cooked and golden all over. Serve hot.
